To describe immune response 21 day follow injection 2003-2004 formulation inactivate , split-virion influenza vaccine Fluzone® , subject age 18-59 year subject age ≥ 60 year .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Immune Responses Fluzone® Vaccination
DOC.detailed_description: Safety assess throughout trial period . Using antigen provide Aventis Pasteur Inc. , pre- post-vaccination serum antibody titer three vaccine strain measure .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Age 18 year great . Ambulatory . In reasonably good health assess investigator . Available duration study ( 21 day + 2d ) . Willing able meet protocol requirement . Willing able give inform consent . Exclusion Criteria : Selfreported allergy egg protein , chicken protein , one constituent vaccine , thimerosal formaldehyde . An acute illness without fever ( temperature > 100.4°F ) 72 hour precede enrollment trial . Clinically significant finding vital sign ( include temperature > 100.4°F ) review system . Selfreported history severe adverse event influenza vaccine . Vaccination influenza 6 month precede enrollment study . Any vaccination 14 day precede enrollment study schedule Visit 1 Visit 3 . Participation experimental drug vaccine trial within 30 day precede enrollment study . Immunosuppressive therapy include longterm ( > 2 week ) systemic corticosteroid cancer therapy within past 3 month ongoing . Receipt blood blood product within 3 month precede enrollment study . Diabetes Any condition , opinion investigator , would pose health risk subject interfere evaluation vaccine ( e.g. , exist severe chronic illness pulmonary disorder , cardiovascular disorder , chronic blood disorder , etc. ) . Person deprive freedom administrative court order ( legal medical guardian ) . For woman childbearing age , positive urine pregnancy test , breast feeding , use medically approve reliable form contraception ( oral contraceptive double barrier method ) duration trial .
